Content: The ‘Pada Yathra’ expedition, being conducted by two differently-able Army and Navy personnel reached Attanagalla Raja Maha Viharaya on Friday (13) and recommenced their journey Saturday (14) morning in order to reach Sapugaskanda. 5 Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment troops of the 141 Brigade accommodated them during their stay at Bulatweldeniya and 8 Sri Lanka Light Infantry troops provided facilities to them at Sapugaskanda. 141 Brigade troops coordinate the expedition during their stay in Colombo.
